seo.title: Manarola FAQ 2025 | Your Questions Answered
seo.description: Common questions about visiting Manarola answered. Parking, swimming, restaurants, Via dell'Amore, and practical travel tips.

body.title: Frequently Asked Questions
body.subtitle: Get answers to the most common questions about visiting Manarola. Practical tips from parking to swimming spots.

features.title: Can I drive to Manarola?
features.description: No cars in the village. Park at Volastra (1.5km uphill) or La Spezia and take the train.

features.title: Is Via dell'Amore open?
features.description: Partially reopened in 2024. Check current status before visiting. Beautiful coastal walk when open.

features.title: Are there sandy beaches?
features.description: No sand, only rocky swimming areas. Flat rocks by the harbor are great for sunbathing.

features.title: Best time for sunset?
features.description: Harbor rocks and Punta Bonfiglio viewpoint. Arrive 30 min early for best spots.

features.title: Where to store luggage?
features.description: Small luggage storage near the train station. Hotels also hold bags for guests.

features.title: How long to spend here?
features.description: Half-day minimum, full day ideal. Stay overnight to experience sunset and evening atmosphere.
